hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bomb Bag#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Heavy Block Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Boomerang#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Wallet# and #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #the Minuet of Forest# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Boomerang#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Queen Gohma#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bomb Bag#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Twinrova# holds...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that if Link could say a few words, he'd be a better public speaker.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
